title: What do you think of LCS using Ninja Tabi to counter Lethality?
body:
When you start seeing Ahri wearing Ninja Tabi In LCS, maby something should be done about leathality.

Before any Ninja tabi nerfs, IMO all 3 leathality items need to cost 300 more and IE, ER, and a few other items need to cost 300 less.

replies.body: Tabi wasn't a problem before physical damage dealers started dealing more damage. If they nerf Tabi they're basically giving the increased amount of damage in the game their blessing and saying: "This is the new standard now. Get used to it."
wrong... Tabi was already strong... Just top laner wasn't rushing it because they were against other tank, adc weren't adc caster as Ez, Jhin, Varus, autoattacker like Ashe, cait... prefer berzerk.
Wait. This is the correct analysis. Why is it downvoted 12 times. Why do bronze get to vote on balance.
Let them... they're still in 7.3
That makes sense, but it still shouldn't be a reason to nerf Tabi.
if item was too strong since age... its a reason IMO. But Riot will surely rework tabi along other defensive item.

this stuff happen only on  events like lcs , because they play  full defensive . 
if you actually try this on a ranked game you will get ganked by the  opponents team fountain

Thats not much a thing off lethality, but more off full ad comps.
I 4-5 out of 5 opponents deal physical damage and alot of that via AAs, Ninjas **should be the god damn right call**. It's the entier point off those boots to be effective in such scenarios.
Also, LW ignoreing half the armor for 1300g atributes to it aswell, ninjas are one of the few items that offer defense vs AAs that isn't easily invalidated with 1300g.

Buffing IE and the crit items is just going to make Tabi more valuable and thus....still bought on most of the roster. Letting actual auto attackers do more damage earlier is just going to make the "12% less damage from autos" even more of a necessity when Caitlyn has IE+Zeal at 15 minutes and does 1/3 your health with a headshot crit (which cannot be dodged like a Varus arrow).
Two Words: Damage Creep

Ding Ding Ding, we have a winner. 


I wish iedge still gave 65 ad, same with thirster and all these other 75 ad items...
30 lethality meet 30 armor on boots

Lethality is bad against armor.

I'll repeat, lethality is BAD against armor.

Some ppl here doesnt seem to understand this and think lethality is an unbeateable stat.

Lethality isn't the problem. And neither is tabi. Back in the day, ADCs use to make randouins as their last item to prevent assassins from killing them. The same thing with GA. The LCS is just showing how unimportant zerker greaves are with the other solid attack speed items, or caster based adcs (jihn, varus, lucian, mf). Tabis aren't the answer to assassins. Armor is.

Tabis are the answer to auto-attackers. Which riot has made intensely better by nerfing burst damage the 5% - 2.5% mastery in the offensive tree. Along with ghostblade's lethality and lethality as a stat instead of flat pen. This has been a slow scaling back of assassins. When all riot has to do is give AD's an item that gives both ARMOR and ATTACK DAMAGE or ATTACK SPEED. There's already an item in the game for ADs when faced with burst Mages (Hexdrinker), but there is no item in the game ADs to defend against burst assassins. The closest thing currently is frozen gauntlet, which is only useful on Ezreal and Urgot (maybe). 

The lack of understanding of basic game mechanics in the community is outstanding.
Logged in to say there is an item that counters AD assassins, two actually, PD (reduces damage) and Steraks.
leath was just nerfd

I think it pisses me right the hell off cause it means it is on the chopping block (which it sadly is on Riot's radar for nerfs) because of the need for it. 

Instead of Riot realizing lethality is the problem, they are looking to "tone down" some friggin boots.

I like when people who want Tabi nerfs keeps over exaggerating their damage negation. "T-Tabi costs only 800 and it n-negates 6k of their items!" when in reality, Tabi negates only 800 - 1k of their stats which ironically is the lethality. Also failing to mention that Tabi's passive loses value the more you gain armor so there's that too.

Ninja Tabi's damage reduction stacks multiplicatively with armor and other damage reduction effects.
Because of this, Ninja Tabi's passive is more effective when you have high armor.
Why df do people copy the pros... Tabi's been good for so long if you havent noticed it's jsut that everyone wants to imitate the pros to win

**TABI'S THE ONLY WAY TO GET ANY ARMOR**

Riot deleted/nerfed every non-tank armor item except Tabi then you wonder why every non-tank builds it? I literally have to build it every game out of necessity because there's no other options.
You mean except all of those slot inefficient tank items that still get your ass blown up because you don't have the stats to fight the enemy?

I'm talking about non-tank armor items for non-tanks a.k.a {{item:3047}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3026}} and that is literally it.

On a side note though tanks like Malphite, Sion, Naut, Zac, Singed, etc. are all in a pretty good place IMO.

Ummm, except that malphite gets enemy stat reduction, sion gets free stats and lots of cc, naut has shield + lots of cc, singed doesn't even really build full tank... 

All of the champs you mentioned here have free shit on their kits that lets them be strong. It isn't because of the items.
That's the definition of a tank champion.
But it shouldn't be... Items should have value outside of "I have an overloaded champ"
And then you open your eyes and see that no one on enemy team actually bought lethality
{{item:3031}} costing less would be a buff to {{champion:157}} . Then boards will just complain about that.
It just shows that even pros know that ADCs are fucking broken, but Riot is goinna nerf Tabi so their precious ADCs have even less counter options.
Riot will leave lethality as is and nerf Tabi to the ground
instead crying u could read last patchs.

They're not building Tabi's simply to counter lethality. They're building Tabi's because Tabi's are OP, pure and simple. Hell, lethality isn't even that good anymore on anything other than assassins; adcs like Lucian, Jhin, and MF have started moving back to crit, or in Lucians case, Botrk and Triforce. Hell, Ghostblade rush is probably the weakest it's been since season 5 when it only had 35 AD; why anyone other than Zed or Talon still rushes that item is a mystery to me.

A buff to other boots is a much better solution. The only boots I ever get are Ninja Tabi and Swiftness Boots. I don't even bother with Berserker's Greaves on anyone anymore. It's because the damage is so high in the game, you melt instantly if you buy anything else unless you're a tank, in which case you need the Swiftness Boots to actually do your job.

Mercurial Treads in particular need a buff. Right now, they do next to nothing. If they had a similar passive as Ninja Tabi, then they'd be good.

Tabi is a vital defense item right now. If Tabi wasn't around, AD itemization would be straight broken. Lethality and Lategame Armor pen shred is so out of control that % auto reduction is the last reliable defense Tanks have.
